subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Fernando González captured his 10th career title and second of the year at the BMW Open in Munich by beating Simone Bolelli, 7-6 (4), 6-7 (4), 6-3. The second-seeded González wasted two match points while leading, 5-4, in the second set in the clay-court match. He went on to win after breaking Bolelli’s serve for the first time at 2-2 in the final set.
